naslov: Luxury Villa in the Heart of Samobor (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju namještena samostojeća kuća tlocrtne površine 129 m2 koja se sastoji od četiri etaže. Uz kuću se nalazi i pomoćna zgrada/ garaža površine 36 m2. Površina parcele je 579 m2. Odlična lokacija; mirna i tiha ulica u kojoj su isključivo obiteljske kuće; svega nekoliko minuta hoda od samoborskog trga, s prelijepim pogledom na Samobor i zapadni dio Zagreba. PRIZEMLJE ( gledano sa stražnje strane kuće ): 2 spavaće sobe, dnevni boravak, kupaonica, gospodarska prostorija, natkrivena terasa na koju se nastavlja ravan vrt. PRVI KAT: ulazni hodnik, kuhinja, blagovaona, tri spavaće sobe, kupaonica, dnevni boravak s izlazom na natkrivenu terasu ( 14 m2 ). DRUGI KAT: ulazni hodnik, spremište, kupaonica, kuhinja s ostavom, blagovaonica, dnevni boravak s izlazom na natkrivenu terasu ( 12 m2 ), radna soba ( može biti i spavaća ). TREĆI KAT: ulazni prostor( na ovoj etaži se nalazi glavni ulaz u kuću), četiri spavaće sobe, tri kupaonice, hodnik, balkon. Pri gradnji kuće korišteni su vrhunski materijali. Vanjska stepeništa obložena su bračkim kamenom, grijanje i hlađenje je organizirano putem moderne kotlovnice sustavom ventilkonvektora, kamini su izrađeni u kamenu. ------------------------------------------------------------ For Sale: Furnished Detached House with 129 sqm Footprint, Spread Across Four Floors. Also Includes an Auxiliary Building/Garage of 36 sqm. Plot Area is 579 sqm. Superb Location; Quiet and Serene Street Lined with Family Houses; Just a Few Minutes' Walk from Samobor Square, Offering Gorgeous Views of Samobor and the Western Part of Zagreb. GROUND FLOOR (viewed from the rear of the house): 2 Bedrooms, Living Room, Bathroom, Utility Room, Covered Terrace Connected to a Level Garden. FIRST FLOOR: Entrance Hall, Kitchen, Dining Area, Three Bedrooms, Bathroom, Living Room with Access to a Covered Terrace (14 sqm). SECOND FLOOR: Entrance Hall, Storage Room, Bathroom, Kitchen with Pantry, Dining Area, Living Room with Access to a Covered Terrace (12 sqm), Study Room (Can Also Serve as a Bedroom). THIRD FLOOR: Entrance Area (Main Entrance to the House on This Level), Four Bedrooms, Three Bathrooms, Hallway, Balcony. The Construction of the House Utilized Premium Materials. Exterior Staircases are Clad in Brač Stone, Heating and Cooling are Managed Through a Modern Boiler Room with Fan Coil System, Stone Fireplaces Enhance the Ambiance.
